questions.content: What kind of feedback are you providing?
Please state if you would like this feedback directly to be shared with the individual
Please state if you would like to receive copy of this feedback
How would you rate overall performance of this individual?
Based on the role this individual performing in your organisation how satisfied are you that their performing their role to their best abilities?
How would you rate individual contribution to your team, the company or to your customer?
Given what you know of this personâ€™s performance, would you want this individual always on you team
Are there areas of improvement that you would recommend for this individual that would help them to accomplish work more effectively?
Please provide any information where an individual has gone above and beyond and you would like them to be recognised?
Any additional information you would like to provide
